net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute

Interface AttributeWriteFormatter<VALUE>

  • Type Parameters:
    VALUE - is the generic type of the value to pass to the formatter.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeReadFormatter<VALUE>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UiWidgetCheckboxesField<VALUE>, UiWidgetComboboxField<VALUE>, UiWidgetOptionsBase<VALUE>, UiWidgetOptionsField<VALUE>, UiWidgetRadioButtonsField<VALUE>, UiWidgetRadioButtonsVerticalField<VALUE>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetComboboxField, AbstractUiWidgetListBoxField, AbstractUiWidgetOptionsField, AbstractUiWidgetRadioButtonsField, AbstractUiWidgetRadioButtonsVerticalField, UiWidgetComboboxFieldGwt, UiWidgetComboboxFieldTestImpl, UiWidgetRadioButtonsFieldGwt, UiWidgetRadioButtonsTestImpl, UiWidgetRadioButtonsVerticalFieldGwt, UiWidgetRadioButtonsVerticalFieldTestImpl

    public interface AttributeWriteFormatter<VALUE>
extends AttributeReadFormatter<VALUE>
    This interface gives read and write access to the formatter of an object.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFormatter(Formatter<VALUE> formatter)
      This method sets the formatter of this object.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute.AttributeReadFormatter

        getFormatter

    • Method Detail

      • setFormatter

        void setFormatter(Formatter<VALUE> formatter)
        This method sets the formatter of this object.
        ATTENTION:
        Please be aware of i18n when implementing formatters.
        Parameters:
        formatter - is the new Formatter to set.
        See Also:
        FormatterToString
